mockPromptTemplates.name: Research Paper Analysis
mockPromptTemplates.description: Template for analyzing academic research papers
mockPromptTemplates.template:
Analyze the following research paper:

Title: {title}
Authors: {authors}

Please provide:
1. Key findings
2. Methodology used
3. Implications
4. Limitations

mockPromptTemplates.name: Customer Issue Resolution
mockPromptTemplates.description: Template for resolving customer support issues

mockPromptTemplates.name: Data Analysis Report
mockPromptTemplates.description: Template for generating data analysis reports
mockPromptTemplates.template:
Dataset: {dataset_name}
Period: {time_period}

Analyze the data and provide:
1. Key metrics
2. Trends observed
3. Anomalies detected
4. Recommendations
